_comment: The first node will be the control-plane node. Each {..} section
describes a single node's IP address and hostname.
Hostnames are optional. They must be unique and only contain
lowercase alphanumeric characters. If not provided, the
default hostnames will be node1, node2, ..., nodeN
These proxy variables will modify the package manager,
http_proxy, https_proxy, and reboot are only taken into
account if set_proxy is set to 'yes'
